players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "This is terrible! We need to work together to find who did this. Did anyone notice anything suspicious?"
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Diana: "Bob, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of a more suspicious target? That seems odd."
You: "Diana, I investigated Charlie because I had a hunch. Trust me, he's mafia. We must vote him out now."
Diana: "Bob, if you're truly the detective, why reveal yourself so early? This feels like a mafia play to mislead us. I'm voting Charlie."

Charlie: "Diana, think about this - if Bob were really the detective, why would he reveal himself immediately and make himself a target? Real detectives stay hidden. Bob is clearly the mafia trying to frame me!"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
